description:
Sonic Robo Blast 2 is a 3D Sonic the Hedgehog fangame based on a modified version of Doom Legacy.


- Fixed renderhitbox causing netgame instability
- Fixed floorsprite rendering causing a possible crash if the sprite had a size of 1Ã—1
- Fixed hitbox interpolation when scaling mobjs
- Optimized sprite rendering in the software renderer
- Exposed skin.supername to Lua
